item.title: Ecologist finds eastern monarch butterflies delaying fall migration
item.description: The study was one of several that assessed the effects of climate change on three species of butterflies whose populations are declining.

item.title: Coffee grounds and Reishi mushroom spores can be 3D printed into a compostable alternative to plastics

item.title: Biomedicine shows the way to future food crops
item.description: Researchers have introduced genetic material into plants via their roots, opening a potential pathway for rapid crop improvement.
